data.text: @Woopocolypse @thereal_truther Same. And it depends on which state you live in (in AUS). Some had longer periods of harsher restrictions than others.

@justlikekevin @thereal_truther I had friends in Australia who were mostly living normally this whole time, with only a few lockdowns here and there. They couldn't leave the country but otherwise things were normal. I don't think people in the US get that.
@Woopocolypse @thereal_truther People have a very simplistic view on lots of things. NZ/Australia is one. Sweden another.
@thereal_truther She thinks people in NZ had to stay inside for two years?? What is wrong with these people?
@jakesyma @doescomputing @thereal_truther It must be nice to make up any old bullshit and actually believe it.
@TrashyToyota @doescomputing @thereal_truther You know, if I didn't know any better, I might suspect 'Ann Bauer' was actually Naomi Wolf's alt account.    🤣 https://t.co/QnEDljuCdQ

@volpiranyas Covid deaths. We are discussing if the vaccine has been effective at reducing Covid deaths despite a lot of “cases.” 

Has it? Yes or no
@thereal_truther Lol, I just gave you a chart of deaths, fishbrain.
@volpiranyas How many Covid deaths? Stop deflecting be an honest person.
